pieceDescriptions.p: Pawn: Moves one square forward, but two on its first move. Captures diagonally.
pieceDescriptions.r: Rook: Moves any number of squares horizontally or vertically.
pieceDescriptions.n: Knight: Moves in an 'L' shape: two squares in one direction, then one square perpendicular.
pieceDescriptions.b: Bishop: Moves any number of squares diagonally.
pieceDescriptions.q: Queen: Moves any number of squares horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.
pieceDescriptions.k: King: Moves one square in any direction.
